p: HPLC‐MS was used to identify the ethanol extracts which contained high levels of nonvolatile compounds. Eleven compounds were identified totally according to the retention time and UV spectra of available authentic standards or by comparison of MS data and literature data (Maatta‐Riihinen, Kahkonen, Torronen, & Heinonen, 2005). The components in four ethanol extracts of Cinnamomum species are listed in Table 2.
